class.speaker: Note
class.text: The class needs to be named 'Bot' for the code to work. The system won't be able to read it otherwise.

main.speaker: Note
main.text: Each bot needs to have a mine() function, with the method signature being: `public int mine(int[][] resources)`.

input.speaker: Note
input.text: Resources input is an array of integer arrays, with gold being demarcated by '1'.

output.speaker: Note
output.text: After mining, bot should return the number of gold found.

end.speaker: Note
end.text: Side note: main entrypoint handled by system. Do not include here.
